    update(double) - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.TimeStep

    updateBodies() - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.Physics
    Updates the state of all bodies in the simulation for the current time step.
    updateForces(List<Body>) - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.GravityCalculator
    Calculates the gravitational forces between all pairs of bodies in the simulation.
    updateFPS() - Static method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.TimeManager
    Calculates the current actual frames per second.
    updateHistory(Vector3D) - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.BodyHistory
    Records the current state in the history buffer.
    updateTrail() - Method in class us.stomberg.solarsystemsim.physics.Body
    Updates the body's trail if: The direction of the body's velocity has changed by at least the trail resolution The body has traversed at least one-tenth of the initial simulation bounds Adds the body's current position to the list of trail vectors and removes the oldest trail element if the trail is at its max length.
